title: @Riot- Maybe give Urgot Xerath's old W?
body:
For those who are unaware, this is Xerath's old W:

>#Locus of Power
>Active: Xerath immobilizes himself at his location, granting his spells 400-range and gaining bonus magic penetration.
>   Bonus Magic Penetration: 16 / 22 / 28 / 34 / 40%
>   This lasts up to 8 seconds but can be canceled early by reactivating the ability. When the effect ends, Xerath gains 35% increased movement speed for 2 seconds.

It was a very cool ability and made Xerath one of a kind, even if it wasn't the most useful. So, for my proposal...why not give Urgot a similar ability? Here's a super rough example of what I imagine it'd be.

>#Noxian Siege Machine
>Active: Urgot slows himself by 100/90/80/70/60% and greatly increases his range on autos, Q and E. He also gains a portion of his AD as bonus armor pen.
>This ability is a toggle and has a 20/15/10/5/0 second lockout.

Some reasoning behind it:

* It fits the Urgot fantasy of "mobile weapons platform" that rains ~~justice~~ destruction from ~~above~~ a grotesque flabby monster.
* Removes part of Urgot's tankiness and replaces it with something more befitting of his core identity.
* Reinforces Urgot's strategic identity more than this half-ranged kiter half-brusing monster identity.
* Allows for a more interesting playstyle as well as a larger window of weakness.
* Can be created in conjunction with a new ult that expands his playstyle to something more interesting, such as a massive bomb or "full auto mode".

Lemme know what ya'll think.

replies.body: Increased auto range seems a bit much.  Also, there's already so much armor pen in the game, that giving a champ even more free armor pen would result in true damage.
Rough idea more than "PUT THIS IN THE GAME". Don't mind the numbers and shit.
I think they should give Kog's passive to Urgot, it would be more fitting for his... identity.
